system.description:
Hurls an explosive sphere of flame that detonates in a fiery blast, dealing fire damage to all creatures in a 20-foot radius.

Scaling: At dice count 3, the radius increases to 30 feet. At dice count 6, the radius increases to 40 feet and ignites flammable objects. At dice count 9, creates secondary explosions. At dice count 12, leaves the area burning for 1 minute. At dice count 15, the explosion is massive, with a 60-foot radius.
